translation.en: Why don't you order a pizza while you're at it?
- You really liked it? - I loved that.
It looked like you were flying.
- Did that part hurt? - No, not unless I get dropped.
translation.es: - ¿Eso duele? - No, a menos que me suelten.

translation.en: Do they know you're auditioning for another company?
translation.es: ¿Saben de la audición para la otra compañía?

translation.en: Can we all go get pizza? Please?
I can't, cookie. I've got to go pack.
translation.es: No puedo, nena. Tengo que empacar.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Dad's being so annoying.
He told me to go to bed and it's not even 10:00 yet.
translation.es: Me envió a la cama y todavía no son ni las 10:00.

translation.en: He treats me like a baby.
translation.es: Me trata como a una bebé.

translation.en: Why are you taking so much stuff?
Your dad doesn't want me to go. That's why he's being so grouchy.
translation.es: Tu papá no quiere que me vaya, por eso anda gruñón.

translation.en: We leave in ten minutes, come on.
I wouldn't be late if I didn't have to feed the chickens.
translation.es: Estaría lista si no tuviera que alimentarlas.

translation.en: You're the one who wanted chickens!
Come here! I'll catch you. Come here!
I called Moshe. He'll be here any minute.
Soccer. Did you remember your homework?
- I could take you. - No, you have to take Ella.
translation.es: - Puedo llevarte. - No, debes llevar a Ella.

translation.en: Listen, the last thing I want to do is to stand in the way of your career.
translation.es: Escucha, lo último que quiero es entorpecer tu carrera.

translation.en: - If you have to move to New York-- - It's an audition.
translation.es: - Pero Nueva York… - Es una audición.

translation.en: I probably won't even get the job, Segev.
- There'll be tons of dancers auditioning. - You'll get it. You're amazing.
translation.es: - Verán a muchos bailarines. - Te elegirán. Eres magnífica.

translation.en: But if you do, we have a lot of decisions to make.
translation.es: Si sucede, debemos tomar muchas decisiones.

translation.en: - You sure you don't want me to take you? - I'm late as it is.
translation.es: - ¿Segura que no puedo llevarte? - Ya voy tarde.

translation.en: It's not a big deal. Be back in a week.
translation.es: No es gran cosa. Volveré en una semana.

translation.en: - Kick their butts, Dani. - I will try.
translation.es: - Acaba con ellos, Dani. - Lo intentaré.

translation.en: - Bring me something cool from New York? - Of course.
translation.es: - Tráeme algo genial de Nueva York. - Claro.

translation.en: - You be good, okay? - Okay. Bye.
Call me the minute you land, okay?
Take good care of her, Moshe.
- Of course. - Have a good trip.
What's up? Do you need something?
I'm supposed to meet someone here.
What is this? What kind of music is that?
translation.es: ¿Qué es esto? ¿Qué clase de música es esa?

translation.en: - ♪ Don't hurt me... ♪ - There's no way. No. Dad! ♪ No more ♪
Dad, no! Dad! Dad! ♪ What is love? Don't hurt me ♪
If Danielle gets that position in New York...
I'm never going to leave you. Never.
- I've got my eye on you. - Quit, dad!
I've got my eye on you.
Here he is! Let's move it, gang!
I'm Segev, your highly recommended tour guide.
translation.es: Soy Segev, su guía altamente recomendado.

translation.en: As you know, Israel is a land of Bedouins, desert and camels.
translation.es: Como saben, Israel es tierra de beduinos, desiertos y camellos.

translation.en: Lucky for you, this is your camel for today.
translation.es: Por suerte para ustedes, este será su camello hoy.

translation.en: So, Singer family, Israel may only exist 70 years,
translation.es: Bueno, familia Singer, Israel tiene 70 años de existencia,

translation.en: but the history of the Jewish people goes back 4,000 years.
translation.es: pero la historia de los judíos se remonta 4000 años.

translation.en: - What time's your flight? - In a couple hours.
translation.es: - ¿A qué hora despegas? - En unas horas.

translation.en: - I just wanted to say goodbye. - Again?
You'll be back in a week.
This whole thing has me a little crazy.
translation.es: Todo esto me vuelve un poco loca.

translation.en: - When's your audition? - Day after tomorrow.
I hate that you're doing this, you're not gonna find anything
translation.es: Odio que hagas esto, no encontrarás nada

translation.en: - better than we have here. - I gotta go.
translation.es: - mejor que lo que hay aquí. - Debo irme.

translation.en: Would you give this to him?
- you have to talk to him-- - I know. I love you.
translation.es: - tienes que hablar con él… - Lo sé. Te quiero.

translation.en: So, if you get this job, Segev's gonna move to the States.
translation.es: Si consigues el empleo, Segev se mudará a EE. UU.
Una relación a larga distancia es difícil.

translation.en: But you two can make it work. I know you can.
translation.es: Pero pueden hacer que funcione, estoy seguro.

translation.en: You've been through so much already.
I knew him when he was married to Shira.
translation.es: Lo conocí cuando estaba casado con Shira.

translation.en: Those two, it wasn't a good thing.
translation.es: Lo de esos dos no era bueno.

translation.en: There was no laughter, no joy...
I'm gonna grab a cup of coffee.
- Good morning, Tzion. - Good morning, Dani.
translation.es: - Buenos días, Tzion. - Buenos días, Dani.

translation.en: - Up for a game, beautiful? - I can't today, Yossi.
- I gotta catch a plane. - Where to?
- New York. - Give my best to Barbra Streisand!
- And buy me Walkman and Reebok! - Okay.
What are you doing? Don't touch that!
No, no, no, Danielle, stay with me.
- Dani! Dani! - Danielle, just hang on.
King Herod built this aqueduct 2,000 years ago,
translation.es: El rey Herodes hizo este acueducto hace 2000 años,

translation.en: - and it stretches from here to-- -
translation.es: y se extiende desde aquí hasta… Un segundo.

translation.en: Just a second. I'm sorry. Okay?
They worked on her for more than an hour and...
translation.es: La atendieron más de una hora y…

translation.en: - We got here the minute you called. - Where is she? I want to see her.
translation.es: - Vinimos ni bien llamaste. - ¿Dónde está? Quiero verla.

translation.en: The doctors did everything they could.
translation.es: los doctores hicieron lo que pudieron.

translation.en: When your wife was struck by the car,
she suffered a severe blow to her head.
translation.es: sufrió un golpe severo en la cabeza.

translation.en: She stopped breathing on the way to the hospital.
translation.es: Dejó de respirar camino al hospital.

translation.en: By the time she got here, she was in full arrest.
translation.es: Llegó aquí con un paro cardiorrespiratorio.

translation.en: We worked on her for quite a while, but we weren't able to...
translation.es: Le dedicamos bastante tiempo, pero no pudimos…

translation.en: I'm very sorry for your loss.
I need to be alone with her.
They did everything they could. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Hicieron todo lo posible. Lo siento.

translation.en: It was a hit- and- run accident. She was crossing the street.
translation.es: La atropellaron y huyeron. Iba cruzando la calle.

translation.en: You want me to speak with Marcia?
No, no. I'll talk to her.
We'll leave as soon as we can get a flight.
translation.es: Iremos en cuanto consigamos un vuelo.

translation.en: So many people tried to help her. The guys from the coffee shop--
translation.es: Muchos intentaron ayudarla, los chicos del café…

translation.en: I just held her hand, Segev.
- I tried to comfort her, as best I could. - Excuse me, are you her husband?
translation.es: - Hice lo que pude para reconfortarla. - ¿Usted es su esposo?

translation.en: Did you find the guy that killed her?
Not yet. We're working on it.
translation.es: Aún no. Estamos trabajando en eso.

translation.en: There are stores on that street. Cameras? Have you checked?
translation.es: Hay tiendas y cámaras ahí. ¿Las revisaron?

translation.en: We'll get to that soon. Don't worry.
- What are you doing here? - Please calm down.
I'm calm. What are you doing? Instead of finding the asshole?
translation.es: Estoy calmado. ¿Qué hacen? Busquen al idiota.

translation.en: Segev. Enough. Let them do their job.
translation.es: Segev, ya basta. Déjalos hacer su trabajo.

translation.en: Enough, enough. I need to get some air.
translation.es: Ya basta, necesito un poco de aire.

translation.en: - The police were just here. - What've they got?
translation.es: - La policía acaba de venir. - ¿Qué saben?

translation.en: They don't have the driver, they haven't found the car.
translation.es: No tienen al conductor, no han encontrado el auto.

translation.en: I don't trust them at all.
I've got to go pick up Ella now.
I'll call as soon as I know anything.
Shapira. What are you doing here?

translation.es: La víctima era miembro de la familia.

translation.en: At least two people in the car. Both male, witnesses said.
translation.es: Había dos personas en el auto. Ambos varones, según los testigos.

translation.en: You can see the skid marks, which start here and end there.
translation.es: Las huellas de derrape empiezan ahí y terminan allá.

translation.en: But she was struck by the car here.
translation.es: Pero el auto la golpeó aquí.

translation.en: Looks like it took them a while to stop.  My guess?
The driver was probably on the phone or texting when he hit her.
translation.es: El conductor estaba al teléfono cuando la arrolló.

translation.en: Maybe he jammed on the brakes, realized she was really messed up,
translation.es: Quizás pisó el freno, vio que estaba malherida,

translation.en: We haven't identified the plate yet,
but I got a couple guys in local stores downloading the video footage.
translation.es: pero un par de agentes están descargando los videos de las tiendas.

translation.en: I got a hit on the plate.
And guess what, this car was reported stolen this morning.
translation.es: ¿Qué creen? Reportaron el robo del auto esta mañana.

translation.en: Put out an APB for the BMW.
translation.es: Emite un boletín de alerta sobre el BMW.

translation.en: I want everyone looking for it.
Well, you're not gonna believe who owns ShalCorp Investments.
translation.es: Adivinen a quién le pertenece Inversiones ShalCorp.

translation.en: This is Detective Tali Shapira. Your husband reported his SUV stolen.
translation.es: Soy la detective Tali Shapira. Su esposo reportó el robo de un auto.

translation.en: Okay... can you give me his cell number?
Yes, sure. I'm just following up.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Le estoy dando seguimiento.

translation.en: Brought some life into the room. Add some life into it.
translation.es: Llenó de vida el auto. Necesita vida.

translation.en: What about the beach? What's your favorite beach in Tel Aviv?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de la playa? ¿Cuál es tu playa favorita en Tel Aviv?

translation.en: Don't you have beaches in New York?
Yeah, but this is the Mediterranean.
translation.es: Sí, pero este es el Mediterráneo.

translation.en: It's my home now, so I want to know where the locals go.
translation.es: Ahora es mi hogar, quiero saber adónde va la gente local.

translation.en: It's in the north of Tel Aviv.
translation.es: Está en el norte de Tel Aviv.

translation.en: - Tel Baruch. - I'll take you there one day.
translation.es: - Tel Baruch. - Te llevaré un día.

translation.en: You guys are here, right? At the Jaffa Hostel?
- Yeah. - So get the fuck out of my car.
translation.es: - Sí. - Entonces bajen del puto auto.

translation.en: Which hotel are you staying at?
Actually, I have an apartment in Neve Tzedek.
translation.es: En realidad, tengo un apartamento en Neve Tzedek.

translation.en: I've been dancing for the past year with Batsheva.
translation.es: Llevo un año con la Compañía Batsheva.

translation.en: - I can give you a ride home. - Are you sure?
Yeah, I just have to pick up my daughter first.
translation.es: Sí, solo debo recoger a mi hija primero.

translation.en: - It's on the way. - It's no problem.
translation.es: - Queda de camino. - No hay problema.

translation.en: So is your wife a tour guide too?
- And she's my ex- wife. - Ah.
Hey, Ella. This is Danielle. She's an American.
translation.es: Hola, Ella. Te presento a Danielle, de EE. UU.

translation.en: - We'll give her a ride home. - Okay.
translation.es: - La llevaremos a casa. - Está bien.

translation.en: Thank you. That was really fun.
So where we going next time?
I'll leave it up to you.
That's him, Rami, and his associate, Nissim Bensimon.
translation.es: Esos son Rami y su socio, Nissim Bensimon.

translation.en: So who's going to talk to him?
No, not here. It's too crowded.
translation.es: No, aquí no. Hay mucha gente.

translation.en: - Come on, let's go. - I'm driving.
- We're in a pursuit after a blue BMW. -
translation.es: Estamos persiguiendo a un BMW azul.

translation.en: 401, get us a roadblock. We're moving fast.
translation.es: 401, cierren la calle. Vamos muy rápido.

translation.en: - Turn right, after him. - Be careful!
translation.es: Da vuelta después de él. Con cuidado.

translation.en: We'll catch them on Raban Gamliel.
Hold on tight. We're gonna catch this motherfucker.
translation.es: Sujétense fuerte. Atraparemos al hijo de puta.

translation.en: Rami, listen to me carefully. Get out of the car right now.
translation.es: Rami, escúchame. Sal del auto ahora mismo.

translation.en: Get out of the fucking car!
I already told you, it was stolen from my house this morning.
translation.es: Ya se los dije, lo robaron esta mañana.

translation.en: I didn't know who you were or what you wanted.
translation.es: No sabía quiénes eran ni qué querían.

translation.en: you always walk around with 400,000 shekels in cash?
Recycling is very lucrative these days.
translation.es: El reciclaje es muy lucrativo hoy en día.

translation.en: Where were you this morning, around 7:55?
translation.es: ¿Dónde estabas esta mañana, alrededor de las 7:55?

translation.en: Yeah, I was taking a shit.
What the fuck? What is this about?
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo pasa? ¿De qué se trata esto?

translation.en: This morning, a young woman was hit by a car as she was crossing the street.
translation.es: Esta mañana, un auto arrolló a una mujer que iba cruzando la calle.

translation.en: I want to talk to my lawyer.
The whole company is just devastated.
I can't imagine how her parents are feeling.
translation.es: No puedo ni imaginar cómo estarán sus padres.

translation.en: Leave a message after the beep and I'll call you back.
translation.es: Deja un mensaje después del tono y te llamaré.

translation.en: Leave a message after the beep and I'll call you back.
translation.es: Deja un mensaje después del tono y te llamaré.

translation.en: Hi, you've reached Danielle's phone. Leave a message after the beep and--
translation.es: Hola, habla Danielle. Deja un mensaje después del tono y…

translation.en: Last night, we were at the Suzanne Dellal Center. I saw this guy.
translation.es: Anoche, en el Centro Suzanne Dellal. Vi a un hombre.

translation.en: - And I think this morning I saw him-- - Segev, I got him.
translation.es: - Creo que lo vi esta mañana… - Lo atrapé.

translation.en: - You're not going to believe this. - Who?
We put together some photos, got a witness ID.
translation.es: Reunimos algunas fotos, un testigo lo identificó.

translation.en: Looks like it was an accident.
We're charging him with vehicular manslaughter
I want to stay with Dad tonight.
Call me if you need anything.
Shira, I'll bring Ella home tomorrow.
Elush, go get ready for bed. I'll come up and say goodnight.
translation.es: Elush, prepárate para la cama. Yo iré a arroparte.

translation.en: - I'll go get you some. - No way.
Two minutes. I'll go to the supermarket.
- Are you kidding me? - Sure. I might even smoke one with you.
They're waiting for you upstairs, sir.
Sorry for calling you so late at night,
but there is an incident that requires our attention.
translation.es: pero un incidente exige nuestra atención.

translation.en: and it looks like we have a problem.
translation.es: y parece que tenemos un problema.

translation.en: Head of Armed Intelligence will get here later with more solid information.
translation.es: La cabeza de Inteligencia traerá información más sólida en un rato.

translation.en: Hey, my love. Is everything okay?
You have to trace that number.
- You sure you want to go there? - You know I'm going to go there.
translation.es: - ¿Seguro que quieres eso? - Sabes que sí quiero.

translation.en: - Look, it's the same number. - Segev.
I have to see you at the Shoftim. I have to see you.
translation.es: Tengo que verte en el Hashoftim. Tengo que verte.

translation.en: - You wanna watch something together? - Sure.
Rami Shalem, known as one of the most notorious gangsters in Israel,
translation.es: Rami Shalem, uno de los gánsteres con peor fama en Israel,

translation.en: was arrested for a suspected hit- and- run murder.
translation.es: fue arrestado por arrollar a alguien y dejar la escena.

translation.en: The deceased is a young American woman,
translation.es: La víctima es una joven estadounidense,

translation.en: Azulai, a dancer with the Batsheva Dance Company,
translation.es: Azulai, bailarina de la Compañía Batsheva,

translation.en: was hit as she was crossing the road.
She was rushed to the hospital where she was declared dead.
translation.es: La llevaron al hospital, donde la declararon muerta.

translation.en: That's awful. I know her from the company.
translation.es: Es terrible. La conozco por la compañía.

translation.en: I should call Ohad Naharin. He's going to be devastated.
translation.es: Debo llamar a Ohad Naharin, debe estar devastado.

translation.en: Where are we going next time? I'll leave it up to you.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde iremos la próxima vez? - Tú decide.

translation.en: Just had the most amazing day at the Jerusalem mountains.
translation.es: La pasé de maravilla en las montañas de Jerusalén.

translation.en: The tour went a little long.
Who was that dropping you off?
The tour guide and his 10- year- old daughter.
translation.es: El guía de turistas y su hija de diez años.

translation.en: I don't know if this is working for me.
translation.es: No sé si estoy bien con esto.

translation.en: I just don't have the time to wait around for you.
translation.es: Pero no tengo tiempo para esperarte.

translation.en: My life is very complicated. You don't seem to understand that.
translation.es: Mi vida es muy complicada, y no lo entiendes.

translation.en: I do the best I can. We have different schedules.
translation.es: Hago lo que puedo. Tenemos horarios distintos.

translation.en: - If you don't feel good about us, then... - Danielle.
translation.es: - Si no te agrada lo nuestro… - Danielle.

translation.en: My marriage is falling apart, I'm under tremendous stress at work.
translation.es: Mi matrimonio se está desmoronando, el trabajo me estresa.

translation.en: You're the only thing I feel good about right now.
translation.es: Tú eres lo único que me agrada por ahora.

translation.en: Then why are we talking like this?
Daddy, what happened? Why are you bleeding?
All good. Here put this on. I'm taking you to Mom's. Let's go.
translation.es: Todo está bien. Ponte esto, te llevaré con mamá. Vámonos.

translation.en: Come to me. Hold on tight.
Close your eyes. Close your eyes, okay?
- Nothing. Just close your eyes. - What happened?
translation.es: - Nada. Solo cierra los ojos. - ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: - Don't go back there, Daddy. - I'll be fine. Don't worry.
translation.es: - No vayas allá, papi. - Estaré bien. Descuida.

translation.en: There was an intruder in my house. He's dead.
translation.es: Alguien entró a mi casa. Está muerto.
Sí. Segev Azulai. Derech Hazaiyt, número 30.
